summary: School's out and it's time for a summer of fun, mischief and love for various characters on Malibu Beach.
cast: Kim Lankford|James Daughton|Susan Player|Michael Luther|Steve Oliver|Flora Plumb|Roger Lawrence Pierce|Sherry Lee Marks|Tara Strohmeier|Rory Stevens|Parris Buckner|Bruce Kimball|Bill Adler|Jim Kester|Diana Herbert|Walter Maslow|Marty James|Tom Mahoney|James Oliver|David Clover|Nathan Roth|Jacqueline Jacobs|Rebecca Ferratti|Bruce Fritzberg|Alexis Schreiner|Kurt Schweickhardt
title: Malibu Beach
